intro: zenBTC is natively minted on Solana.

risk_factors: Has mint authority - tokens can be minted

recommendations: Consider decentralizing mint_authority - current setup is high risk

key_findings: No freeze authority is associated with the token contract.
9t9RfpterTs95eXbKQWeAriZqET13TbjwDa6VW6LJHFb is the core governance contract for the token. This contract sets various authorities and parameters related to the token contract.

The 9t9RfpterTs95eXbKQWeAriZqET13TbjwDa6VW6LJHFb contract can be upgraded by DG5oGv3tXHWyK7WDgdw2Am51WkCNGv8hMgnqYejbpyGD, a 3/5 multisig. Upgrades can change the stucture of the contract or assign various roles, including pausers, minters, and more.
